intro: Astroloba tenax, commonly known as the star lily or fire lily, is a member of the Asparagaceae family. It is native to South Africa and is characterized by its striking, star-shaped flowers that range in color from yellow to orange. The plant typically grows as a clump-forming succulent with fleshy, narrow leaves that are often tinged with red or purple. Its flowers bloom in late spring or early summer, adding a vibrant display to its habitat. Astroloba tenax is well adapted to arid conditions, making it a popular choice for rock gardens and xeriscaping.
